sense.gloss: coffee shop, tearoom, coffee lounge, coffeehouse, cafe
having one's fill (of food or drink), eating (drinking) to one's heart's content
teahouse, tearoom, coffee lounge, coffee shop, (rather formal) cafe
to smoke, to breathe in, to inhale
to suck, to sip, to slurp
to be surprised, to be amazed, to be frightened, to be astonished, to get startled, to jump
to eat, to drink, to smoke, to take
to suffer (e.g. defeat), to receive a blow

sdata.j: ここでは↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓は↑禁↑↓きん↓じられている。
sdata.e: You are prohibited from smoking here.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓を↑禁↑↓きん↓じる。
↑禁煙↑↓きんえん↓↑席↑↓せき↓か、↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓↑席↑↓せき↓のどちらになさいますか。
↑勤務↑↓きんむ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓の↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓は↑禁止↑↓きんし↓されている。
sdata.e: Smoking on duty is not allowed.

sdata.j: ↑許可↑↓きょか↓なく↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓することをご↑遠慮↑↓えんりょ↓↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please refrain from smoking without permission.

sdata.j: ↑喫茶店↑↓きっさてん↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ったら、↑二↑↓に↓↑人↑↓にん↓の↑青年↑↓せいねん↓がテレビでレスリングの↑試合↑↓しあい↓を↑見↑↓み↓ていた。
sdata.e: As I entered the café, I found two young men watching a wrestling match on television.

sdata.j: ↑喫茶店↑↓きっさてん↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ったら、↑２人↑↓ふたり↓の↑青年↑↓せいねん↓がテレビでレスリングの↑試合↑↓しあい↓を↑見↑↓み↓ていた。
sdata.e: As I entered a tearoom, I found two young men watching a wrestling match on television.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓↑席↑↓せき↓を↑頼↑↓たの↓んでおいたのですが。
sdata.e: I asked for a seat in the smoking section.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓↑席↑↓せき↓を↑頼↑↓たの↓んだのですが。
sdata.e: I asked for a seat in the smoking section.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓↑席↑↓せき↓をお↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。

words.gloss: coffee shop, tearoom, coffee lounge, coffeehouse, cafe
having one's fill (of food or drink), eating (drinking) to one's heart's content
